articles.description: The temporary move is a tongue-in-cheek embrace of Dorsey’s public diss of the blockchain, and Solana fans are enjoying the joke.

articles.description: An anonymous petition calls for the removal of top Coinbase execs amid the underwhelming launch of Coinbase NFT and other missteps.

articles.description: Neal Stephenson, who coined the term "metaverse" in his seminal novel "Snow Crash," speaks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson along with Bitcoin Foundation founder Peter Vessenes, about the new "free metaverse" they're co-launching, Lamina1.

articles.description: Terra's collapse boosted activity on Ethereum and BNB Chain. But Tron is also getting a boost from its algorithmic stablecoin that resembles... Terra.

articles.description: In total, 9 members of Congress have reported trading crypto assets on their financial disclosures since 2020.

articles.title: This Week in Coins: Ethereum Slides 11% Despite Ropsten Testnet Merge

articles.description: Cardholders will be able to earn Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies on purchases made via the Amex-powered credit card.

articles.title: Jack Dorsey’s TBD Is Building an 'Extra' Decentralized 'Web5' on Bitcoin

articles.description: The former face of Robinhood's crypto business left to help lead NFT portfolio tracking app Floor. She explained the move on Decrypt's gm podcast.
articles.title: Why Christine Brown Left Robinhood for an NFT App

articles.description: Inflation rebounded in May after an April slowdown, impacting on a crypto market increasingly correlated with tech stocks.

articles.description: Seventeen million tokens were returned, 1M sent to Vitalik Buterin is "being recovered."  The rest? Bounty for the hacker, says Optimism Foundation.

articles.description: Charging Bitcoin miners the highest rate wasn't enough. Chelan County has now implemented a new crypto rate that's 29% higher.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miners Will See 29% Rate Hike on Hydroelectric Power in Washington

articles.description: Ledger's base-model hardware wallet gets a long-overdue update, adding a bigger screen and increased storage capacity.
articles.title: Ledger Nano S Plus Review: A Top Hardware Wallet Refreshed for 2022

articles.description: Former Robinhood Crypto COO Christine Brown is among the three co-founders of Floor, a new NFT portfolio app with its own member NFTs.
articles.title: Former Robinhood, Button, Venmo Execs Raise $8M for NFT Company Floor

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: The report cites concerns about the network's crash-prone node architecture. But Solana Labs has already refuted many of the claims.
articles.title: Solana Challenges Poor Safety Rating From DeFi Watchdog

articles.description: The new Bitcoin Academy will offer classes, including "What is Cryptocurrency," to members of the Marcy Houses community where Jay-Z grew up.
articles.title: Jay-Z and Jack Dorsey Launch 'Bitcoin Academy' at Rapper's Childhood Home in Brooklyn

articles.author: Daniel Phillips,Stephen Graves
articles.description: Hardware wallets are the safest way to store your cryptocurrencies securely. But which is the best option? We review the leading devices.
articles.title: Best Crypto Wallet: The Top 8 Hardware Wallets

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The price of XTZ was quick to react to the news of USDT launching on the Tezos blockchain, soaring by 9% earlier in the day.
articles.title: Tezos Hits Four-Week High Following USDT Launch

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Pitched as a venture capital firm for the “creative class,” Felix Capital raised fresh funding with a focus on Web3 and crypto investments.
articles.title: Felix Capital Raises $600 Million to Boost Web3 Exposure

articles.description: Paul Puey, CEO of Edge Wallet, spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Edge's announcement of a new "confidential" crypto Mastercard. After Edge announced the card on Wednesday, Mastercard blasted crypto media to say it has nothing to do with the product—despite Puey telling Decrypt, "MasterCard is involved in entire process. They fully approved this, it’s fully legal and approved by MasterCard. It fits entirely within their framework.”
articles.title: Edge CEO Paul Puey Talks 'Confidential' Bitcoin Mastercard Launch

articles.description: Christine Brown left her perch as Robinhood Crypto COO at the end of March to launch a new crypto venture. Now she has announced her new gig: Co-founder and COO at Floor, a token-gated NFT portfolio app that has raised an $8 million seed round. She talked to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the company's plans, her own crypto and NFT bags, and her outlook on NFTs and on Robinhood.
articles.title: gm: Christine Brown Left Robinhood to Go Full NFT

articles.description: Spencer Dinwiddie's creator token platform Calaxy has raised another $26 million in funding. Dinwiddie tells Decrypt's Stacy Elliott what makes Calaxy stand out and why it can succeed.
articles.title: NBA's Spencer Dinwiddie Talks $26M Raise for Social Crypto App Calaxy

articles.description: Rebecca Lamis, who co-founded UnicornDAO with Nadya Tolokonnikova of the band Pussy Riot, sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson in Justin Aversano's new Quantum Art physical NFT space to discuss diversity and inclusion in Web3.
articles.title: How To Change the 'NFTs Are Bad' Narrative: UnicornDAO Co-Founder Rebecca Lamis

articles.description: Quantum's Justin Aversano sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at the new Quantum Spaces in Santa Monica, CA. Justin discusses the gallery, his new project Doppelganger, and what's next for real-world NFT exhibitions.
articles.title: Twin Flames Creator Justin Aversano Opens Physical NFT Space in LA

articles.description: Shiti Manghani of STEPN, Ty Blackard of NFTY Labs, William Quigley of Wax blockchain, and Spencer Yang of Gomu talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts about how the next era of NFTs will have utility and real-world use cases, as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.
articles.title: NFTs with Utility: STEPN, NFTY Labs, Wax, and Gomu Predict What's Next

articles.description: Dan Held, a longtime Bitcoin influencer and now head of growth marketing at crypto exchange Kraken, talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts about Bitcoin maximalists (he calls himself a "mostamalist"), NFTs, and Crypto Winter as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.
articles.title: Kraken's Dan Held Talks Bitcoin Maximalism and Crypto Winter

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin speaks with Hollywood producer Bryan Unkeless and team members Bryce Anderson and Blaise Hemingway about their Web3 sci-fi project Runner, starting with an NFT project and a comic book all about racing.
articles.title: What Is Runner? 'Hunger Games' Co-Producer's Web3 Sci-Fi Project

articles.description: Decrypt’s Kate Irwin talks to veteran Hollywood film producer Niels Juul about why he’s going all in on NFTs and Web3.
articles.title: ‘The Irishman’ Exec Producer Niels Juul Gets Into NFTs

articles.description: Decrypt's Stephen Graves heads to the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he sits down with Leo Matchett of Decentralized Pictures, the Roman Coppola-backed nonprofit using crypto and blockchain voting to find, fund, and produce films.
articles.title: Decrypt at Cannes: Decentralized Pictures CEO Leo Matchett Talks Hollywood Embracing Crypto

articles.description: Decrypt's Stephen Graves is on the scene at the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he spoke to Miguel Faus, director of the film "Calladita," who funded his movie by selling NFTs to backers including NounsDAO.
articles.title: Decrypt at Cannes: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus on Funding Films with NFTs

articles.description: Episode 10 of the gm podcast: Crypto and sports continue to converge, and one of the best examples is DraftKings. CEO Jason Robins joins Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts to talk about how DraftKings is embracing NFTs as prizes, when the company might accept crypto for entry fees and bets, and how his experience dealing with regulators and lawmakers mirrors what crypto companies are now going through in Washington.
articles.title: gm: DraftKings Goes Crypto

articles.description: Web3 is the next evolution of the Internet, built on blockchains. Blockchains are a new kind of database, making new types of peer-to-peer apps possible. This has profound implications for humanity.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What is Web3?

articles.description: In Episode 10 of the Navigating the Metaverse podcast, hosted by Cathy Hackl and Tommaso di Bartolo, Andrew Hayward of Decrypt and Josh Roth of Decrypt Studios discuss how companies are approaching the metaverse, where it could all go next, and what it was like to watch a movie in a Lamborghini on the moon.
articles.title: How Brands Are Creating Immersive Experiences in the Metaverse
